import { useContext } from "react"; import { Headercontext } from "../Headerdata/HeaderData"; const SocialButton = () => { const { googleLoader, setGoogleloader, facebookLoader, setFacebookloader } = useContext(Headercontext); return ( <>
setGoogleloader(true)} > {!googleLoader ? ( <>

Continue with Google

) : ( )}
setFacebookloader(true)} > {!facebookLoader ? ( <>

Continue with Facebook

) : ( )}
); }; export default SocialButton;
